lead_paragraph: The government, eager to show it can still provide services in areas it does not control, has allowed hundreds of students to leave besieged areas.

headline.print_headline: Syria Grants Students Access to Year-End Exams
headline.main: Syria Allows Students to Leave Rebel-Held Areas to Take Exams

snippet: The government, eager to show it can still provide services in areas it does not control, has allowed hundreds of students to leave besieged areas.
